summary: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, during the Allied retreat in the Libyan desert, an American tank picks-up a motley group of survivors but they face advancing Germans and a lack of water.

keywords: world war two|tank|british soldier|reference to muhammad|italian soldier
title: Sahara
